alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:25PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE...CENTRAL CABELL...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN WAYNE COUNTIES... At 224 PM EST, a snow squall was located over Barboursville, or near Proctorville, moving east at 45 mph. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Hamlin, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Beech Fork State Park, Barboursville, Kenova, Milton, Ceredo, Ona, South Point, Burlington, West Hamlin, Lavalette, Salt Rock, and Pea Ridge. This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 2 and 28. Visibilities will drop quickly to around a quarter of a mile in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
